description: Episode of Series "Challenge for change/Societe nouvelle". Joan is a welfare mother with seven children. Originally from the Maritimes, she now lives in Montreal. She would like to work as a waitress, and feels she'd be a better mother if she could. But day care costs more than she can afford.
